snippet.title: Game & Watch - Mario's Cement Factory (New Wide Screen) (c)1983 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
This is the "New Wide Screen" release of Mario's Cement Factory, part of the Game & Watch series from Nintendo.  This is the version most people are likely to be familiar with, although there was also an earlier and significantly different version released as a Table Top.  Emulation of this one was by Sean Riddle and hap, predating Algestam's involvement.

Game & Watch artwork for MAME was done by DarthMarino (more recently emulated units) and hydef (units emulated before 2020)
https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY  DarthMarino 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5 hydef
